org.acra.prefs

Class SharedPreferencesFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.acra.prefs.SharedPreferencesFactory

  • public class SharedPreferencesFactory
extends Object
    Responsible for creating a SharedPreferences instance which stores ACRA settings.

    Retrieves the SharedPreferences instance where user adjustable settings for ACRA are stored. Default are the Application default SharedPreferences, but you can provide another SharedPreferences name with AcraCore.sharedPreferencesName().

      static boolean shouldEnableACRA(SharedPreferences prefs)

    • Method Detail

      • shouldEnableACRA

        public static boolean shouldEnableACRA(@NonNull
                                       SharedPreferences prefs)
        Check if the application default shared preferences contains true for the key "acra.disable", do not activate ACRA. Also checks the alternative opposite setting "acra.enable" if "acra.disable" is not found.
        Parameters:
        prefs - SharedPreferences to check to see whether ACRA should be disabled.
        Returns:
        true if prefs indicate that ACRA should be enabled.

      • create

        @NonNull
public SharedPreferences create()
        Returns:
        The Shared Preferences where ACRA will retrieve its user adjustable setting.
